author: @worthplayingeic
title: Worthplaying | 'Teared' Is An Action/Platformer Coming To Nintendo Switch, PlayStation and PC Later This Month, Xbox Later - Screens & Trailer
text: Dive into the heart-pounding world of Teared, an exhilarating 3D arcade action-platformer that takes you on a rollercoaster ride through 9 captivating levels and 2 bonus stages. Prepare to confront a formidable lineup of adversaries, including 9 colossal bosses and an array of fantastical creatures like dragons, skeletons, bats, spiders, and menacing cyclops. As the hero in this fantasy universe, you'll navigate perilous landscapes, battling foes with precision and mastering the art of platforming. The game offers a diverse arsenal, with 3 distinct weapons to discover and wield strategically. Each weapon brings its own set of advantages, empowering you to customize your playstyle and devise effective strategies against the relentless horde of enemies. Teared is not just a game; it's an immersive journey where dynamic 3D graphics meet intense gameplay. Experience the thrill of a side-scrolling adventure set in a three-dimensional world, combining classic action with modern design elements. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or a newcomer to the arcade genre, Teared promises hours of excitement and entertainment. Dive into a journey filled with big monsters, retro vibes, challenges, and adventure! Are you ready for this epic journey? Key Features: - 9 challenging levels and 2 bonus stages to conquer. - Face off against 9 epic bosses with unique abilities and attack patterns. - Battle a diverse range of enemies, including dragons, skeletons, bats, spiders, cyclops, and more. - 3 different weapons available. - A side-scroller game with 3D graphics. Teared is coming to Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5 and PC ( Steam ) on April, 25, 2024 at $7,99/7,99 â‚¬, followed by Xbox One & Series at a later time. [More articles about Teared](/game/17890-teared/)
